data.text: @pjbpricebailey @HodgeHillChurch @TraineeVicarMan So it did! Thanks so much Dean for making the connection - it has been a wonderful gift of grace, and especially so yesterday. Lenten blessings with you both too. 🙏🏽
@pjbpricebailey @hodgehillvicar @HodgeHillChurch Beautiful. Thanks for sharing and glad to be a small part of this. May you both draw near to God this #Lent
@hodgehillvicar @HodgeHillChurch @TraineeVicarMan this started with you pointing Alâ€™ towards me! 🙏🏻
@hodgehillvicar @HodgeHillChurch @pjbpricebailey So glad. The repair is beautiful.
@hodgehillvicar @HodgeHillChurch @pjbpricebailey It also looks like jumping for joy 😂🙌 shimmers of gold and glimpses of resurrection <><
@Suzanne_VY @hodgehillvicar @HodgeHillChurch Thank you - I loved doing it. 🙏🏻

@hodgehillvicar @HodgeHillChurch @pjbpricebailey Oh it's perfect in its brokenness 🙌 I very much enjoy Kintsugi 😊 drawing attention to the broken places and increasing its value 🙏 Someone did a great job! And even more now what a beautiful plate to hold the broken body/bread 💚 <><
@hodgehillvicar @HodgeHillChurch @pjbpricebailey That repair is so beautiful. Your post reminded me of this song by The Brilliance https://t.co/nj8PJ2A9Vm
